title: Spaceship Engine Sounds Vol. 2
description: The second version of the futuristic spaceship engine sound package, including 336 high-quality sound effects, 16 kinds of spaceships. Perfect for spacecrafts, spaceships, large drones and UFOs, space and sci-fi vehicles.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/spaceship-engine-sounds-vol-2

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2ocd3azttuqzw88/MSE%20-%20Spaceship%20Engine%20Sounds%20Vol.%202.pdf?dl=0


A spaceship is a futuristic vehicle with several engines that can be used for civilian and military purposes. Spaceships are available in different sizes.


The collection includes sounds for each vehicle:

  • 32 fast and 32 slow acceleration sounds
  • 32 fast and 32 slow deceleration sounds
  • 80 seamless loops of engine rpm sounds at five speeds - idle, low rpm, mid rpm, high and very high rpm
  • 128 transition sounds between speeds


A total of 16 spaceships in the set.


Each vehicle engine is a complex, massive and multi-layered sound that contains realistic samples of vehicles, aircrafts and several layers of synthesis.Â 


Can be used to create many types of futuristic vehicles: spacecrafts, spaceships, futuristic battleships, large drones and UFOs, space and sci-fi vehicles and objects. Enjoy!


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 336 game-ready sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 16 spaceships in total
  • 5 types of engine rpm - idle, low, mid, high, very high
  • 80 seamless loops of engine sounds in total
  • 64 acceleration sounds, 64 deceleration sounds
  • 128 transition sounds between engine rpm
  • perfect for the game genres of simulation, adventure, strategy and more


Number of Audio Waves: 336

Number of Audio Cues: 336

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 45 minutes 52 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
